title: Junior Suite
seo_title: Junior Suites in Lower Manhattan | The Frederick
excerpt: Junior Suites in New York City at the Frederick Hotel offer one king bed and a pullout sofa bed, and can accommodate up to four guests with services included.
description: Junior Suites in New York City at the Frederick Hotel offer one king bed and a pullout sofa bed, and can accommodate up to four guests. Standard services and amenities are all included in each of our hotel suites in TriBeCa. Experience the very best boutique NYC accommodations have to offer.
amenities_list:
• One king bed with a pullout sofa bed
  • Accommodates up to four guests
  • Complimentary Wi-Fi
  • Work Desk
  • Flat-screen TV
  • Hair Dryer
  • C.O. Bigelow bath amenities
  • Frette luxury linens and towels
  • iPod docking station
  • Cordless telephone
  • Valet Laundry
  • Movies on-demand
  • Iron and ironing board
  • Current copy of Time Out Magazine
  • In room safe
